Question: This person is the hostess, judge and executive producer of The CW Television Network show America's Next Top Model.
Hints: Tyra Lynne **** (born December 4, 1973) is an American actress, author, television personality and former model.
As a child this person suffered form what she calls an "Ugly duckling" period in her life.
